snippet: Adam Lanza had many magazines of bullets for the rifle and two pistols he used, officials said.
abstract: Adam Lanza, gunman responsible for shootings at Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn, reportedly shot his mother multiple times before leaving the house with a large cache of bullets for the four weapons he used; these and additional details of the rampage are disclosed as residents of Newtown head to church services and take part in vigils seeking outlets for their grief.

byline.contributor: Randy Leonard reported from Newtown, Conn., and Michael Schwirtz from New York.

lead_paragraph: Adam Lanza had many magazines of bullets for the rifle and two pistols he used, officials said.

headline.seo: Gunman Took Big Supply of Ammunition to School After Killing Mother at Home
headline.main: Gunman Took Big Supply of Ammunition to School After Killing Mother at Home
headline.print_headline: Gunman Took Big Supply of Ammunition To School After Killing Mother at Home
